panels.description: Ops/sec, classified by legacy wire protocol type (query, insert, update, delete, getmore)
panels.title: Mongos Operations Total

targets.expr:
sum(max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_metrics_cursor_open{cluster="$cluster", state="total"}[$interval]) or
max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_metrics_cursor_open{cluster="$cluster", state="total"}[5m]) or 
max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_cursors{cluster="$cluster", state="total_open"}[$interval]) or
max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_cursors{cluster="$cluster", state="total_open"}[5m]))

panels.description: Count of chunk splits over last 10 minutes
panels.title: Chunk Split Events

panels.description: Count, over last 10 minutes, of all types of config db changelog events.
panels.title: Change Log Events

panels.description: Ops/sec, classified by legacy wire protocol type (query, insert, update, delete, getmore)

targets.expr:
sum(sum(rate(mongodb_op_counters_total{cluster="$cluster", type!="command"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_op_counters_total{cluster="$cluster", type!="command"}[5m])) by (instance) * on (instance) 
group_right mongodb_mongod_replset_my_state{cluster="$cluster"} / mongodb_mongod_replset_my_state{cluster="$cluster"}) by (set)

panels.title: Operations Per Shard

targets.expr: sum(sum(mongodb_mongod_metrics_cursor_open{cluster="$cluster", state="total"} or mongodb_mongod_cursors{cluster="$cluster", state="total_open"}) by (instance) * on (instance) group_right mongodb_mongod_replset_my_state{cluster="$cluster"} / mongodb_mongod_replset_my_state{cluster="$cluster"}) by (set)

max(max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_replset_member_optime_date{cluster="$cluster", state="PRIMARY"}[$interval]) or 
max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_replset_member_optime_date{cluster="$cluster", state="PRIMARY"}[5m])) by (set) - min(min_over_time(mongodb_mongod_replset_member_optime_date{cluster="$cluster", state="SECONDARY"}[$interval]) or
min_over_time(mongodb_mongod_replset_member_optime_date{cluster="$cluster", state="SECONDARY"}[5m])) by (set)

panels.description: Timespan 'window' between oldest and newest ops in the Oplog collection
panels.title: Oplog Range by Set
